ROW.title: B Store
ROW.description:
Provides an interface for: - BOSS featured applications - BOSS application updates.
*Categories and search are in working progress.

ROW.title: App Store
ROW.description: Minor bugs fixed in updates section for new versions of applications.

ROW.title: App Store
ROW.description: Remove unwanted containers with empty content. Minor layout changes in the updates section. More detailed application info viewer.

ROW.title: App Store
ROW.description: UI fixes. Update all applications button added in updates section.

ROW.title: App Store
ROW.description: New section for identity apps added. Other minor fixes and performance improvements.
